import React from 'react' const About = () => { return ( <>

About

Introduction

I'm a passionate MERN Stack developer, specializing in building and managing the front-end of modern web applications. I leverage the power of this JavaScript-based stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) to create user-centric interfaces that drive product success. Head over to the Projects section to explore my work and see how I bring ideas to life! Beyond coding, I'm dedicated to giving back to the developer community. I share my learnings and experiences through informative content, empowering others to excel in the world of web development. Connect with me on LinkedIn and Instagram! I regularly post valuable insights and tips related to the MERN Stack and web development in general. I'm always eager for new challenges and opportunities to grow my skills. If you have a project that aligns with my expertise and passion for the MERN Stack, reach out! Let's collaborate and build something amazing together.

Skills

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • React
  • Node.js
  • Express.js
  • MongoDB
  • Git
  • Redux
) } export default About
